overview: Be Somebody is a meditation on culture, society, and self-exploration set against a backdrop of a metropolitan city experiencing a renaissance. The short narrative film follows three Addis Ababa-based teenage boys as they embark on a road trip to Lake Langano. Throughout this journey, Tefera, Omar, and Yoni must navigate cultural differences and shifting societal expectations that ask them to engage with ways of being that are not their own.
title: Be Somebody
